channel.title: Omg i cant login my server! limit connections!
channel.description: How do i change the limit connections on Deltascape source? big help thanks! Ill rep++ you if help i cant login my own serveR!

item.title: Omg i cant login my server! limit connections!
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Server.java might have a maxconnections line but if it doesnt look in tutorials for this.
(if your using delta you should know how to edit this)

for (int i = 0; i < MaxConnections; i++) { if (Connections[i] == connectingHost) { Found = ConnectionCount[i]; break; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Omg i cant login my server! limit connections!

item.title: Omg i cant login my server! limit connections!
item.dc:creator: @Dylza Dylza
item.description:
@Dylza wrote:

well, go to server.java, ctrl+f look for maxconnections or maxplayers, and change the amount, easy.
